import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; interface DocumentType { id: string; name: string; category: string; icon: string; shortDetails: { label: string; value: string; }[]; bgColor: string; textColor: string; } const Documents: React.FC = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [selectedDocument, setSelectedDocument] = useState(null); const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const documents: DocumentType[] = [ { id: 'aadhaar', name: 'Aadhaar Card', category: 'Identity', icon: 'ðŸ†”', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Number', value: '1234 5678 9012 3456' }, { label: 'Name', value: user?.name || 'Ramesh Kumar' }, { label: 'Status', value: 'Active' } ], bgColor: 'bg-orange-50', textColor: 'text-orange-700' }, { id: 'pan', name: 'PAN Card', category: 'Identity', icon: 'ðŸ’³', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Number', value: 'ABCDE1234F' }, { label: 'Name', value: user?.name || 'Ramesh Kumar' }, { label: 'Status', value: 'Active' } ], bgColor: 'bg-blue-50', textColor: 'text-blue-700' }, { id: 'driving', name: 'Driving License', category: 'Transport', icon: 'ðŸš—', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Number', value: 'MH20 20220012345' }, { label: 'Valid Till', value: '01-01-2040' }, { label: 'Class', value: 'LMV, MCWG' } ], bgColor: 'bg-green-50', textColor: 'text-green-700' }, { id: 'passport', name: 'Passport', category: 'Travel', icon: 'ðŸ›‚', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Number', value: 'A1234567' }, { label: 'Valid Till', value: '01-01-2030' }, { label: 'Type', value: 'Ordinary' } ], bgColor: 'bg-purple-50', textColor: 'text-purple-700' }, { id: 'voter', name: 'Voter ID Card', category: 'Identity', icon: 'ðŸ—³ï¸', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Number', value: 'ABC1234567' }, { label: 'Constituency', value: 'Mumbai South' }, { label: 'Status', value: 'Active' } ], bgColor: 'bg-indigo-50', textColor: 'text-indigo-700' }, { id: 'ration', name: 'Ration Card', category: 'Welfare', icon: 'ðŸŒ¾', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Number', value: '12345678901234567890' }, { label: 'Type', value: 'APL' }, { label: 'Members', value: '4' } ], bgColor: 'bg-yellow-50', textColor: 'text-yellow-700' }, { id: 'pf', name: 'PF Account Statement', category: 'Finance', icon: 'ðŸ’°', shortDetails: [ { label: 'UAN', value: '123456789012' }, { label: 'PF Number', value: 'MH/12345/123456' }, { label: 'Balance', value: 'â‚¹2,50,000' } ], bgColor: 'bg-emerald-50', textColor: 'text-emerald-700' }, { id: 'bank', name: 'Bank Passbook', category: 'Finance', icon: 'ðŸ¦', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Account', value: '1234567890123456' }, { label: 'IFSC', value: 'SBIN0001234' }, { label: 'Balance', value: 'â‚¹75,000' } ], bgColor: 'bg-cyan-50', textColor: 'text-cyan-700' }, { id: 'insurance', name: 'Health Insurance', category: 'Insurance', icon: 'ðŸ¥', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Policy No', value: 'HI1234567890' }, { label: 'Sum Insured', value: 'â‚¹5,00,000' }, { label: 'Valid Till', value: '31-03-2025' } ], bgColor: 'bg-red-50', textColor: 'text-red-700' }, { id: 'lic', name: 'LIC Policy', category: 'Insurance', icon: 'ðŸ›¡ï¸', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Policy No', value: 'LIC123456789' }, { label: 'Sum Assured', value: 'â‚¹10,00,000' }, { label: 'Premium', value: 'â‚¹25,000/year' } ], bgColor: 'bg-teal-50', textColor: 'text-teal-700' }, { id: 'income', name: 'Income Certificate', category: 'Certificate', icon: 'ðŸ“Š', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Certificate No', value: 'IC/2024/12345' }, { label: 'Annual Income', value: 'â‚¹5,00,000' }, { label: 'Valid Till', value: '31-03-2025' } ], bgColor: 'bg-amber-50', textColor: 'text-amber-700' }, { id: 'caste', name: 'Caste Certificate', category: 'Certificate', icon: 'ðŸ“œ', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Certificate No', value: 'CC/2024/12345' }, { label: 'Category', value: 'General' }, { label: 'Valid Till', value: '31-03-2025' } ], bgColor: 'bg-lime-50', textColor: 'text-lime-700' }, { id: 'domicile', name: 'Domicile Certificate', category: 'Certificate', icon: 'ðŸ ', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Certificate No', value: 'DC/2024/12345' }, { label: 'State', value: user?.state || 'Maharashtra' }, { label: 'Valid Till', value: '31-03-2025' } ], bgColor: 'bg-rose-50', textColor: 'text-rose-700' }, { id: 'birth', name: 'Birth Certificate', category: 'Certificate', icon: 'ðŸ‘¶', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Registration No', value: 'BC/2024/12345' }, { label: 'Date of Birth', value: '01-01-1990' }, { label: 'Place', value: user?.city || 'Mumbai' } ], bgColor: 'bg-pink-50', textColor: 'text-pink-700' }, { id: 'marriage', name: 'Marriage Certificate', category: 'Certificate', icon: 'ðŸ’’', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Registration No', value: 'MC/2024/12345' }, { label: 'Date', value: '01-01-2020' }, { label: 'Place', value: user?.city || 'Mumbai' } ], bgColor: 'bg-violet-50', textColor: 'text-violet-700' }, { id: 'property', name: 'Property Registration', category: 'Property', icon: 'ðŸ˜ï¸', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Survey No', value: 'PR/2024/12345' }, { label: 'Area', value: '1000 sq ft' }, { label: 'Value', value: 'â‚¹50,00,000' } ], bgColor: 'bg-stone-50', textColor: 'text-stone-700' }, { id: 'electricity', name: 'Electricity Bill', category: 'Utility', icon: 'âš¡', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Consumer No', value: 'EB123456789' }, { label: 'Units', value: '250 kWh' }, { label: 'Amount', value: 'â‚¹1,500' } ], bgColor: 'bg-yellow-50', textColor: 'text-yellow-700' }, { id: 'water', name: 'Water Bill', category: 'Utility', icon: 'ðŸ’§', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Consumer No', value: 'WB123456789' }, { label: 'Usage', value: '15,000 L' }, { label: 'Amount', value: 'â‚¹800' } ], bgColor: 'bg-blue-50', textColor: 'text-blue-700' }, { id: 'gas', name: 'Gas Connection', category: 'Utility', icon: 'ðŸ”¥', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Consumer No', value: 'GC123456789' }, { label: 'Connection Type', value: 'Domestic' }, { label: 'Subsidy', value: 'Yes' } ], bgColor: 'bg-orange-50', textColor: 'text-orange-700' }, { id: 'phone', name: 'Phone Bill', category: 'Utility', icon: 'ðŸ“ž', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Number', value: user?.phoneNumber || '+91 9876543210' }, { label: 'Plan', value: 'Unlimited' }, { label: 'Amount', value: 'â‚¹599' } ], bgColor: 'bg-green-50', textColor: 'text-green-700' }, { id: 'gst', name: 'GST Registration', category: 'Business', icon: 'ðŸ¢', shortDetails: [ { label: 'GSTIN', value: '27ABCDE1234F1Z5' }, { label: 'Status', value: 'Active' }, { label: 'Type', value: 'Regular' } ], bgColor: 'bg-indigo-50', textColor: 'text-indigo-700' }, { id: 'trade', name: 'Trade License', category: 'Business', icon: 'ðŸª', shortDetails: [ { label: 'License No', value: 'TL/2024/12345' }, { label: 'Business Type', value: 'Retail' }, { label: 'Valid Till', value: '31-03-2025' } ], bgColor: 'bg-purple-50', textColor: 'text-purple-700' }, { id: 'fssai', name: 'FSSAI License', category: 'Business', icon: 'ðŸ½ï¸', shortDetails: [ { label: 'License No', value: 'FSSAI123456789' }, { label: 'Business Type', value: 'Food Service' }, { label: 'Valid Till', value: '31-03-2025' } ], bgColor: 'bg-emerald-50', textColor: 'text-emerald-700' }, { id: 'pollution', name: 'Pollution Certificate', category: 'Vehicle', icon: 'ðŸŒ¿', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Certificate No', value: 'PC/2024/12345' }, { label: 'Vehicle No', value: 'MH12AB1234' }, { label: 'Valid Till', value: '31-03-2025' } ], bgColor: 'bg-green-50', textColor: 'text-green-700' }, { id: 'vehicle', name: 'Vehicle Registration', category: 'Vehicle', icon: 'ðŸš™', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Registration No', value: 'MH12AB1234' }, { label: 'Vehicle Type', value: 'Car' }, { label: 'Owner', value: user?.name || 'Ramesh Kumar' } ], bgColor: 'bg-blue-50', textColor: 'text-blue-700' }, { id: 'vehicle_insurance', name: 'Vehicle Insurance', category: 'Vehicle', icon: 'ðŸš—', shortDetails: [ { label: 'Policy No', value: 'VI123456789' }, { label: 'Vehicle No', value: 'MH12AB1234' }, { label: 'Valid Till', value: '31-03-2025' } ], bgColor: 'bg-cyan-50', textColor: 'text-cyan-700' } ]; const categories = ['All', 'Identity', 'Transport', 'Travel', 'Welfare', 'Finance', 'Insurance', 'Certificate', 'Property', 'Utility', 'Business', 'Vehicle']; const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('All'); const filteredDocuments = selectedCategory === 'All' ? documents : documents.filter(doc => doc.category === selectedCategory); const openModal = (document: DocumentType) => { setSelectedDocument(document); setIsModalOpen(true); }; const closeModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(false); setSelectedDocument(null); }; const renderDocumentClone = (document: DocumentType) => { if (!document) return null; switch (document.id) { case 'aadhaar': return (
